title: Collectives
add_members_hint: Add members to the collective to see their merged tree visualization.
your_recognition_tooltip: Your-Recognition: your acknowledgment of contributions towards the realization of your priorities
mutual_recognition_tooltip: Mutual-Recognition: Your mutual-recognition with another is the minimum of your recognition of each other. This displays your mutual-recognition with each as a % of your total-mutual-recognition with all!
no_contributors_yet: You have not yet recognized any contributors! Adding contributors to a node makes it a contribution!
no_mutual_contributors: You don't have any mutual contributors yet!
